stories.headline: Anthropic ditches its core safety promise
Google API keys weren't secrets, but then Gemini changed the rules
Fentanyl makeover: Core structural redesign could lead to safer pain medications
OpenAI Codex and Figma launch seamless code-to-design experience
stories.summary: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

stories.headline: Disrupting malicious uses of AI | February 2026
stories.summary: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

stories.headline: Show HN: Agent Swarm – Multi-agent self-learning teams (OSS)
Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer
stories.summary: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

stories.headline: Tell HN: YC companies scrape GitHub activity, send spam emails to users
Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
stories.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

stories.headline: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners
stories.summary: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

stories.headline: eBay to lay off 800 staff
stories.summary: The latest round of layoffs marks eBay’s third workforce reduction in the past three years.

stories.headline: Figma partners with OpenAI to bake in support for Codex
stories.summary: Figma is integrating OpenAI's coding assistant Codex a week after it announced a similar integration with Anthropic's Claude Code.

stories.headline: Trace raises $3M to solve the AI agent adoption problem in enterprise
stories.summary: Trace is launching with $3 million in seed funding, including investment from Y Combinator, Zeno Ventures, Transpose Platform Management, Goodwater Capital, Formosa Capital, and WeFunder.

stories.headline: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff: This isn’t our first SaaSpocalypse
stories.summary: Salesforce reported a solid year-end earnings and then pulled out all the stops to ward off more talk of the death of its business to AI.

stories.headline: Gushwork bets on AI search for customer leads — and early results are emerging
stories.summary: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT.
